channel.title: My Very own WebOS
channel.description:
Yeah, with HTML. It's kind of like Windows XP but it's different, lol..
It's kind of in progress, but I need help.
ThatOneServer has a calculator window, how would I go about making a window like that?
Doesn't have to be a calculator, just any window.
kthx.
(BTW, it's just called "K")

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

I was going to let people look at it when I was finished.
But now since everyone is stupid, I’m just not going to even finish.
If I would have finished I would have been hated.

BEcause I stole the idea.
/sarcasm

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

any chance of a look at your OS?

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

[quote=“Kollidierende, post:17, topic:180485”]I just liked the fact that someone had made a WebOS like XP. Using XP’s images.
So I decided to make my own, with my own images.
I created the code and everything.[/quote]

Kollidierende:

I didn’t steal anyone’s idea.

You didn’t stole the code, but the idea. Get over it/yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Thanks for you posts, well not really, but stilll.

I said it’s “Like XP” but it’s not.
I didn’t steal anyone’s idea.
I just liked the fact that someone had made a WebOS like XP. Using XP’s images.
So I decided to make my own, with my own images.
I created the code and everything.

I didn’t steal any idea, get over yourselves.

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

JV:

s!ms challenges anyone to find a webOS before wubuntu. I’ll be interested to see if it’s true or not

Well I found 10, look at ThatOneServer’s thread…

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Just let him, he will fail teribbly hard.

If you want a calculator, write one in javacript. If you want a window, I suggest looking at dom drag.

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“JV, post:8, topic:180485”][quote author=Niall link=topic=241774.msg2046840#msg2046840 date=1202750744]

This is getting silly, although ThatOneServer copied the Wubuntu idea thing.

And they copied the one before that, and that, and that, going all the way back to win95. Really, it’s been done before and it is not truly unique any more, it’s like saying “website x is copying my website because they have a forums and I had them first”.
[/quote]

s!ms challenges anyone to find a webOS before wubuntu. I’ll be interested to see if it’s true or not :)[/quote]

It really depends on what you define webOS by.

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:12, topic:180485”]no, that isn’t why.
he’s ticked off that you are ranting (even though you say that you are not) about that others are making a web-OS
he says S!ms came up with the idea first, but every web developer has either wanted to see/experience it with enough determination has made one
FlyAKiteOSX’s or w/e website had something like it a long time ago even to now(I think)[/quote]
thats where i first had my idea to make one for xp, then somebody told me i should try to make my own, then somebody told me that s!ms made one.

http://osx.portraitofakite.com/index2.htm

just to clear things up why i am not doing what he is doing:

His plan is to make a WebOS.
My plan is to make a bunch of web games/software, but the WebOS is basically the container.

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

no, that isn’t why.
he’s ticked off that you are ranting (even though you say that you are not) about that others are making a web-OS
he says S!ms came up with the idea first, but every web developer has either wanted to see/experience it with enough determination has made one
FlyAKiteOSX’s or w/e website had something like it a long time ago even to now(I think)

Read full topic

item.title: My Very own WebOS
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Nah i get what your trying to say bang train.

  1. “It’s kind of like Windows XP”
  2. “ThatOneServer has a calculator window, how would I go about making a window like that?”

He doesnt even know what hes doing, doesnt know how to google, and is trying to do something thats already being made.

btw sims made a webos to be a webos. i’m making a webos as a design for my project.

Read full topic

This is getting silly, although ThatOneServer copied the Wubuntu idea thing.
